aidan
2018+ handmade-web.net

an introduction to making websites by hand
currently teaching at Virginia Commonwealth University

2023 calendar

small print-at-home calendar that i started making for personal use but thought i could share in case anyone else wanted to use...

requires a ruler and knife/scissors to cut it out

i'm working on them one month at a time, so i'll upload the future months as we near them

pdfs: jan, feb

2020-22 forwisconsin.com

with Eric Timothy Carlson

website for a wisconsin voting intiative that started in 2020
updated again for the 2022 midterm elections

the original site was hosted on eauxclaires.com
archived version is here

2022 pecha kucha

video for the 2022 vcu gdes faculty pecha kucha. turned out to be a nice introduction and update for where i am at the moment

2019 pump house

group show at the pump house in richmond

i scattered some blocks around the building, tucked them into corners. i didn't want to take up much space or distract from the pump house

2019 eddies

installed briefly in a stairwell with some other objects
